code: import CartActionTypes from"./cart.types";export var toogleCartHidden=function toogleCartHidden(){return{type:CartActionTypes.TOOGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItemFromCart=function removeItemFromCart(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:CartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};
